attributes.action: completely Scrap all forms of Positive Discrimination
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are getting fed up of this nonsense. Positive Discrimination is both racist and sexist as it usually is geared towards ethnic minorities and black people and women. I am yet to see it be in favour of a white male. We the undersigned have no problems with Ethnic minorities, Blacks and Women but we do not want to see many recruited just because of the tick box exercise that positive discrimination is.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
